name: Such Space!
description:
This is a small space shoot 'em up game built in Unity.

Kill enough enemies to proceed to the next level and see if you can beat the final boss.

Move the ship via arrow keys or WASD, Aim with the mouse, and fire by pressing the mouse button

This was built around content from a learning course from Michigan State University and using assets from that project, but has been modified to fit my needs.

Modifications:

  1. Three complete levels of progressing difficulty
  2. Added a new boss enemy with particle effects and custom weapons
  3. Added enemy spawners that can spawn a variety of enemies
  4. Each level features a distinct visual theme
  5. Revised the title screen to make it a bit more appealing

Created by Matt Eland
